```{r setup}
library(GLAM)
```

```{r}
samp_time <- seq(0, 10, 1)
haplo_freqs <- rep(0.1, 10)
lambda <- 0.2
theta <- 0.5
decay_rate <- 0.1
sens <- 0.9

n_infections_true <- 1:5

sim2 <- sim_cohort(n = 5,
                   samp_time = samp_time,
                   haplo_freqs = haplo_freqs,
                   lambda = lambda,
                   theta = theta,
                   decay_rate = decay_rate,
                   sens = sens,
                   n_inf = n_infections_true,
                   return_full = TRUE)

g <- glam_mcmc$new(df_data = sim2$df_data)

g$init(start_time = 0, end_time = 10, chains = 2,
       n_infections = n_infections_true, max_infections = 10)

g$burn(iterations = 1e2)
```
